casebody.data:
MARUKA USA, INC., Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
SPECIALTY LIGHTING INDUSTRIES, INC., Defendant-Respondent,
v.
Mori Seiki USA, Inc., d/b/a DMG/Mori USA, and DMG Mori Seiki Company, Ltd., Third-Party Defendants. M-244/245 September Term 2018
081585 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 2, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for direct certification (M-244) is denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for consolidation (M-245) is dismissed as moot.
